title: The Ultimate Guide to Making Games on Kahoot

steps.title: Go to https://create.kahoot.it/auth/login.
steps.content: Go to https://create.kahoot.it/auth/login . You can open the link on your computer, phone, or tablet. You may also download the Kahoot mobile app to create or play games on Kahoot.

steps.title: Log in or create an account.
steps.content: Log in or create an account. You can use your Google, Microsoft, Apple, or Clever account to log in, or you may create a specific Kahoot login. [1] X Research source If you don't have an account, click Sign up to create one now. If you're under 13 (US) or 16 (outside the US), you are unable to sign in with an email, and must use one of the third-party sign-in methods. You also will not be able to make a public Kahoot, or access any Kahoots other than those already featured on the Discover tab. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click Create a new kahoot.
steps.content: Click Create a new kahoot . It is located atop your page, represented by a plus sign inside a green box. On the mobile app, this button will simply say "Create" and will be located at the bottom of your screen.

steps.title: Choose a template or create a new game from scratch.
steps.content: Choose a template or create a new game from scratch. If you choose a template, you'll have a premade game available to tweak. [3] X Research source If you chose to create a new game, you'll start from a blank form. If a template (or any other feature) is marked with an encircled blue star, it is only available to paying Kahoot+ Premier subscribers. Click Settings on the next page to change the Kahoot's title, description, cover image, language, or save-to location. You can update these items now, or after putting together your game.

steps.title: Click Add question and choose a question type.
steps.content: Click Add question and choose a question type. This will add a new tile to the Kahoot. Only the quiz and true/false options are free. All other question types require a Kahoot+ Premier subscription. To add question text, type in the "Click to start typing your question" field. Then add possible answers in the fields below the image area and click to select the correct answer. A multi-choice question requires at least 3 options. Only Kahoot+ Premier subscribers may add more than 4. You can add an image to the image field by clicking Find and insert media . [4] X Research source The right-hand side of the page includes options for adjusting the question's time limit or point value. The default time limit is 20 seconds.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . You'll see this in the upper right corner of the page. Click this when you're done creating your Kahoot and want to return to your dashboard. [5] X Research source You may also preview your game at any time before saving it by selecting "Preview" from the top-right corner of the page. Mobile app users can find the "Preview" option by first tapping the ... icon in the top-right corner and selecting it from the drop-down menu. A window pops-up so you can test your game or share it with others. When you share a Kahoot with others, they need to have a Kahoot account as well.

steps.title: Edit your Kahoot's visibility.
steps.content: Edit your Kahoot's visibility. If you want to make your Kahoot private or public, you can quickly update its visibility by viewing the game within your Library tab. Then, click on the small icon in the game's info bar, and select your desired visibility from the drop-down menu. As a reminder, users under 13 (or 16 outside the U.S.) cannot create a public Kahoot. All such users will see their Kahoot games automatically set to Private. Paid subscribers to Kahoot+ Publisher may also set their games as Unlisted, allowing them to still share the game via a web link, while also hiding it from Kahoot's Discover page. Private Kahoots, on the other hand, can only be shared within the Kahoot website or app.

steps.title: Click Start on a Kahoot game's info page.
steps.content: Click Start on a Kahoot game's info page. You can play your own creation, or you can use Kahoot's Discover tab to explore a selection of games and find one to play. [6] X Research source You will see a PIN appear on your screen once the game is ready to begin. Many games on Kahoot are free, but some games must be purchased Ã  la carte, while others are only included as part of K!+ AccessPass.

steps.title: Visit https://kahoot.it/ on a separate device.
steps.content: Visit https://kahoot.it/ on a separate device. Kahoots are most commonly played on your mobile phone, but you may also open the link on a computer or tablet. You may also download the Kahoot mobile app to play games. Encourage those with whom you want to play to visit the link or download the app as well.

steps.title: Enter the Kahoot's unique PIN.
steps.content: Enter the Kahoot's unique PIN. Share the PIN with everybody else who wants to play. As each member enters the PIN and joins the game, you will see their username appear on your computer screen. Click Start once you are ready for the game to begin.
